meanings.definition: To rely on or trust in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I depend on my alarm clock to wake me up in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She can depend on her best friend to always be there for her.
meanings.sent3: The cat depends on its owner for food and shelter.
meanings.sent4: The success of the project will depend on everyone working together.
meanings.sent5: The fragile plant depends on regular watering to survive.

meanings.definition: To be determined or influenced by something.
meanings.sent1: The outcome will depend on the weather conditions.
meanings.sent2: His mood often depends on how much sleep he gets.
meanings.sent3: The color of the paint will depend on the lighting in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to travel will depend on her work schedule.
meanings.sent5: The flavor of the dish will depend on the spices used.

meanings.definition: To be contingent or based on something.
meanings.sent1: The success of the event will depend on the number of attendees.
meanings.sent2: The price of the product depends on the cost of materials.
meanings.sent3: The availability of the product will depend on the supplier's schedule.
meanings.sent4: The speed of the internet connection depends on the service provider.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the performance will depend on the rehearsal time.
